name: readerrevenuesubscriptionlinking_publications_readers_getEntitlements
description: Gets the reader entitlements for a publication reader. - Returns PERMISSION_DENIED if the caller does not have access. - Returns NOT_FOUND if the reader does not exist.

name.description: Required. The name of the reader entitlements to retrieve. Format: publications/{publication_id}/readers/{reader_id}/entitlements

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

$block: A singleton containing all of a reader's entitlements for a publication.

$ul: **entitlements**: All of the entitlements for a publication reader.
**name**: Output only. The resource name of the singleton.
